column5: If your skies are clear you might want to look up after dark.  http://www.cbc.ca/news/technology/auroras-expected-to-dazzle-again-tonight-1.3125824
Time to take a drive after dark!
I'm going fishin'. I'll try to take a break from landing fish to look up.
They said you can see the northern lights in Toronto tonight. HA! Maybe with a power outage.
